original_title: Gross Indecency: The Everett Klippert Story
overview: In 1965 mild-mannered Calgary bus driver Everett Klippert was the last Canadian to be jailed for homosexuality. Kevin Allen of the Calgary Gay History Project journeys to better understand Klippert and his place in Canadian LGBTQ history.
title: Gross Indecency: The Everett Klippert Story
